summary: Email correspondence between attorneys Brad Edwards and Brittany Henderson from Edwards Pottinger LLC and an Assistant United States Attorney regarding coordination to share documents and photographs from a victim related to her encounters with Jeffrey Epstein. The emails discuss arranging a meeting with the victim and providing emails and photographs from the relevant time period.

events.title: Email coordination for victim meeting
events.description: Attorneys Brad Edwards and Brittany Henderson correspond with federal prosecutors about arranging a meeting with a victim in Los Angeles and providing emails and photographs related to Epstein.

events.title: Photographs provided to prosecutors
events.description: Brittany Henderson sends two photographs of the victim from the relevant time period to federal prosecutors.

events.title: Meeting with victim in California
events.description: Federal prosecutors meet with a victim in California who mentions providing emails about encounters with Epstein to her attorneys.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY
keyFacts: Attorneys Brad Edwards and Brittany Henderson are coordinating with federal prosecutors to provide emails and photographs from a victim related to her encounters with Jeffrey Epstein.
The victim had previously provided a batch of emails about Epstein to her attorneys, which prosecutors are seeking to obtain.
Two photographs of the victim from the relevant time period were attached and sent to prosecutors on September 30, 2019.
Prosecutors planned to be in Los Angeles to potentially meet with the victim in December 2019.
The correspondence indicates ongoing evidence gathering by the Southern District of New York in the Epstein case as of late 2019.
